item.title: Wuthering Waves version 2.7 update ‘Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides’ launches October 9
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

Beneath the Dark Tide, It stirs once more...

Kuro Games will release the version 2.7 update for free-to-play open-world action RPG Wuthering Waves, dubbed “Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides,” on October 9, the developer announced.

Here is an overview of the update:

  • New Main Quests
    • Chapter II Act X: The Bygone Shall Always Return
    • Chapter II Act XI: Dawn Breaks on Dark Tides
    • Afterstory: A Stranger in a Strange Land
  • New Echoes
    • Nightmarer Viridblaze Saurian
    • Nightruare: Baby Roseshroom
    • Nightmares Baly Virallilaze Saurian
  • New Sonata Effect
    • Flamewing’s Shadow – 3pcs Set: Dealing Echo Skill DMG increases Heavy Attack Crit. Rate by 20% for 65. Dealing Heavy Attack DMG Increases Echo Skill Crit. Rate by 20% for 6s. While both effects are active, gain 16% Fusion DMG Bonus.
  • New Tactical Hologram Challenge
    • Tactical Hologram: Lioness of Glory
  • Optimizations
    • Resonator Ascension Planner
      • The Resonator Ascension Planner will be available in Version 2.7. This new feature can be accessed via the Resonator menu. The planner has four sections: Resonator, Weapon, Echo, and Skill. Personalized plans will be automatically generated for all Resonators based on your current SOL3 Phase.
    • Better Quest Experience
      • The “Journey Log” feature will be added to the Quest system. Joumey Log allows you to view all the Main Quests (chapters), with each chapter divided into different Acts. In future updates, Journey Log will incorporate other Quest types.
    • User Interface Upgrade and New Features
      • The event menu will be upgraded; Events will be divided into three categories: Featured Events, Recurring Events, and Permanent Events, for ease of access. A new summary panel for Recurring Events will be added to the map where you’ll be able to get reminders for these events and track your current progress.
      • The Gallery will include a new category: Enemies. You can view detailed Information on all the enemies you’ve defeated on your journey
      • The “Terminal Swap” feature will also be added. Upon completing Version 2.7’s Main Quests, you can obtain a new Terminal, “Daylight Flintstone.” You can then switch between Terminals.
    • Environmental Interactions
      • Global Filter will be made available across all platforms in Version 2.7. (Mobile users can try out this feature when it becomes available in Version 2.7.)
      • The “Eye Comfort” option will be added to the Settings menu. By clicking into the “Eye Comfort” settings, you can customize color temperature, brightness, intensity, and other parameters. Additionally, in Version 2.7, the interactive effects and details are further refined; more Resonators and skills can interact with the environment, making exploration more immersive.
  • New Resonators
    • Galbrena
    • Qiuyuan
  • Upcoming Featured Resonator Convene
    • Phase I: From Ashes (New)
    • Phase I: Roar of Triumph
    • Phase II: Wanderer Knows No Far and Near (New)
    • Phase II: Between Light and Shadow
  • New Weapons
    • Lux & Umbra
    • Emerald Sentence
  • Upcoming Featured Weapon Convene
    • Phase I: Lux & Umbra (New)
    • Phase I: Wildfire Mark
    • Phase II: Emerald Sentence (New)
    • Phase II: Blazing Justice
  • Special Events
    • Lament Recon: Solaris Soldier – Combat Event
    • Gifts of Approaching Dawn – Seven-Day Login Event
    • Gifts of Ink Song – Limited-Time Login Event
    • Freeze Frame: Action Highlights – Combat Photography Event
    • Septimont Weather Forecast – Featured Platforming Event
    • Lollo Campaign: Ice Savior – Featured Commission Event
  • Collaboration
    • Wuthering Waves x MOONDROP Special Collaboration “The Call of the Beyond” – Coming Soon

Wuthering Waves is available now for PlayStation 5, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play. The PC version will also be available via Steam starting April 29.

item.title: Possessor(s) launches November 11
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Fast-paced action side scroller dated.

Side-scrolling action adventure game Possessor(s) will launch for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on November 11, publisher Devolver Digital and developer Heart Machine announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Devolver Digital:

About

In Possessor(s) you play as Luca, a high-schooler trapped in the ruins of Sanzu City, a sprawling metropolis overrun with otherworldly horrors following an interdimensional catastrophe. Her body broken, Luca strikes a deal with Rhem, a newly freed demon in need of a host. Together, they make a last-ditch effort to survive.

Possessor(s) combines elements of platform fighters and Metroidvanias, offering stylish combat and exploration with a focus on juggling, aerial combos, and improvised weapons like kitchen knives, a guitar, and a computer mouse.

As Luca and Rhem learn to co-exist, they’ll develop new skills to help them navigate a huge, interconnected city while exploring different districts, each with unique challenges and atmosphere. Possessor(s) also explores themes of codependency, loss, and survival as Luca searches for her mother and best friend in the ruins of Sanzu.

Key Features

  • A Fractured World – Possessor(s) takes place across the interconnected sprawl of a destroyed mega-city, from collapsed skyscrapers to an abandoned aquarium, all riddled with secrets. Hauntingly beautiful 3D environments form a stunning backdrop over which hand-drawn and animated characters, and mysterious science-fiction horror action take center stage.
  • A Complex Narrative – Choose multiple paths in an open-ended world structure as you look to uncover the truth behind the catastrophe. Meet a cast of engaging characters, each with their own heart-breaking story to follow in the aftermath of the devastation.
  • A Precision Engagement – Gameplay is centered around tight, fast-paced platforming with a range of unique movement abilities that extend to its tense, precise combat. Balance ground and air attacks, replete with combos and juggles as you encounter a variety of deadly enemies, and challenging bosses. Find and unlock a wide array of powerful weapons and upgrades to bolster your arsenal and explore previously inaccessible areas.
